name: Drinks Cards (Learn Languages)
description: Quick, Fun & Easy Ways to Learn Drinks with Multi Languages.  The app helps to easy learning many kinds of drinks from the cards and know their names in several languages.  - Learn English - Learn Spanish - Learn Chinese - Learn Japanese - Learn korean  The app provides the best way to get started learning many kinds of drinks, which contains many cards , each word card are voice-enabled, and related words and pictures.  * The app supports for language switching, then you can learn many kinds of language at the same time. (English / Chinese / Japanese / Korean / Spanish )  * The App contains 5 kinds of Jigsaw Puzzle Game. * Support Quiz feature.  The app contains many fancy, interesting, funny cards that make you play and learn at the same time. Moreover, It improves the language learning, cognitive learning and listening ability.  ......  [JS10240219 C10]
